text:
ok! Lunch. 12? 1? 

I'm trying to think of a recommendation. Off the top of my head there's 蒼龍唐玉堂 across from Roppongu Hills if you like Japanese style dandan noodles. Kind of heavy. There's also 旬の味 たき下 a japanese teishoku place although it's about a 10-15 minute walk from Roppongi down the same street as Savoy. Savoy is also great. I haven't been in years.

text:
Hey all. Introductions? Ok, well, I made video games for 25+ years C64->PS3, worked on the Chrome GPU team at Google making WebGL, and stumbled on the Future of Coding podcast recently.

I don't know if have anything to add but I am interested in the topic. I wrote a simple signal based visual programming system for a game I worked on. I worked with a visual programming system called "Virtools" in like 2004. I also got lucky and by chance got to visit Dynamicland last March. I would love to discuss all that stuff somewhere and learn more.

text: Let’s do 1pm. I put it in my calendar. The Teishoku place sounds good to me, or we can go to Savoy. Let’s play it by ear when I’m there.
